    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_HARD_CACHE_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_HARD_CACHE_SIZE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IMAGE_LOADER_SERVICE

        public static final String IMAGE_LOADER_SERVICE
        Use with Context.getSystemService(String) to retrieve an ImageLoader for loading images.

        Since ImageLoader is not a standard system service, you must create a custom Application subclass implementing ContextWrapper.getSystemService(String) and add it to your AndroidManifest.xml.

        Using this constant is optional and it is only provided for convenience and to promote consistency across deployments of this component.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ImageLoader

        public ImageLoader(android.content.Context context,
           int defaultDrawableId,
           boolean shouldCacheOnSD,
           int hardCacheCount,
           PhotosQueue.QueueMethod queueMethod)
        Parameters:
        context - application or activity context
        defaultDrawableId - the placeholder icon that will be displayed while the photo is loading or in case of an error
        shouldCacheOnSD - if the files should be cached on SD card
        hardCacheCount - the maximum amount of photos that should be kept in memory
        queueMethod - to set if the photos will be loaded FIFO(QUEUE) or LIFO(STACK)

        fetchBitmapAsync(String, int, ImageLoaderListener)

      • fetchBitmapAsync

        public void fetchBitmapAsync(String url,
                    int bitmapSizeInPixels,
                    ImageLoaderListener listener)
        This method executes in the background via AsyncTask. If successful it returns a Bitmap of the image in the required maximum size specified. It uses the SDcard cache to fetch the image if already downloaded. This method doesn't store the images in the memory cache!
        Parameters:
        url - The URI of the photo
        bitmapSizeInPixels - the maximum size of the bigger side of the photo in pixels
        listener - callback for the result

      • displayImage

        public void displayImage(String url,

                ImageLoaderListener listener)

      • displayImage

        public void displayImage(String url,
                android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                int bitmapSizeInPixels,
                ImageLoaderListener listener)
        Binds a bitmap to the specified imageView. Uses in-memory cache and SDCard cache.
        Parameters:
        url -
        imageView -
        bitmapSizeInPixels -

      • downloadBitmap

        public android.graphics.Bitmap downloadBitmap(String url)
        See Also:
        downloadBitmap(String, int)

      • downloadBitmap

        public android.graphics.Bitmap downloadBitmap(String url,
                                     int bitmapSizeInPixels)
        This method runs in the same thread that it is called in. see fetchBitmapAsync(String, int, ImageLoaderListener) for an Async Download task or use this one for a different async process.
        Parameters:
        url - the URI of the file to load
        bitmapSizeInPixels - size the maximum size of the bigger side of the photo in pixels
        Returns:
        a bitmap of the requested photo URL
